hero.heading: Understand What Your Visitors Really Think
hero.text: With Alium In-Page, transform your website content into a source of live insights. Collect feedback directly within your pages, discover what resonates, and make every section of your site more engaging and effective.

offerings.heading: Feedback Integrated Into Your Content
offerings.description: Alium In-Page transforms static content into interactive experiences. Empower your visitors to share real-time thoughts on what works, what doesn’t, and how you can improve — all without disrupting the browsing experience.

items.title: Content Feedback Analytics
items.text: Discover what your visitors think of your content and optimize based on real, contextual feedback. Eliminate guesswork and focus on what truly matters.

items.title: Increase Customer Loyalty
items.text: Build stronger relationships by understanding your visitors’ needs. Deliver the experience they expect and turn one-time visitors into loyal fans.

useCasesData.heading: Features That Help You Listen, Learn, and Improve
useCasesData.subheading: Alium In-Page brings feedback collection to the next level — embedded directly within your website content.

items.heading: Optimize Based on Real Content Performance
items.description: Collect insights on specific paragraphs, images, or sections to understand what truly engages your audience. Your feedback widget sits seamlessly within the page, giving you a contextual view of visitor opinions.

points.title: Granular Insights
points.text: Get feedback on exact content areas for precision improvements.

points.title: Real-Time Context
points.text: See how visitors interact and what triggers their feedback.

points.title: Performance Tracking
points.text: Identify which content drives the most engagement.

items.heading: Create Your Own Feedback Experience
items.description: Design interactive, conditional surveys that adapt to your users’ behavior. Alium’s drag-and-drop widget builder makes it easy to create beautiful, on-brand experiences.

points.title: Full Design Control
points.text: Customize colors, fonts, and layout to fit your site’s branding.

points.title: Conditional Logic
points.text: Show follow-up questions based on user responses.

points.title: Effortless Setup
points.text: Publish widgets instantly — no developer needed.

items.heading: Integrate Like a Pro
items.description: Alium In-Page embeds directly into your content areas for seamless data flow. Connect with your analytics or CRM tools to unify insights across channels.

points.title: Plug-and-Play Setup
points.text: Add your widget anywhere with a simple script tag.

points.title: Cross-Platform Compatibility
points.text: Works flawlessly across CMS platforms and frameworks.

points.title: Data Sync
points.text: Integrate feedback into analytics or customer profiles.

items.heading: Turn Every Response Into an Actionable Insight
items.description: Alium’s visual dashboard helps you monitor engagement, identify key issues, and prioritize improvements. Go beyond the ‘what’ — understand the ‘why’.

points.title: Visual Reports
points.text: Get interactive dashboards for quick understanding.

points.title: Data Filtering
points.text: Segment feedback by page, device, or visitor type.

points.title: Export & Integrate
points.text: Easily share insights or connect with other tools.

cta.heading: Make Every Page Speak for Itself
cta.subheading: Turn your content into a live feedback engine. Start collecting contextual insights today and create a site your visitors truly love.
